name: engram-mcp-server
description: Engram — Persistent Memory Cortex for AI coding agents. Gives agents session continuity, change tracking, decision logging, and project intelligence across sessions.
releaseNotes:
### v1.4.0 — Versioned Installs, Auto-Update & Update CLI

- Version-tracked installer entries (_engram_version stamp) with 4 install states: added, exists, upgraded, legacy-upgraded
- Background auto-update check (fire-and-forget, opt-out, 24h throttle)
- Update notifications in engram_start_session with changelog included
- User-controlled update flow: update, skip version, postpone (7d/2w/1m), or disable
- Two-source changelog delivery: npm registry primary, GitHub Releases API fallback
- New --check CLI flag: per-IDE version display + npm latest comparison
- engram_stats now includes server_version, update_status, auto_update_check
- engram_config: 4 new update keys including duration parsing for remind_after
- Pre-publish inject-release-notes.js script for single-HTTP-call changelog delivery

Full changelog: https://github.com/keggan-std/Engram/releases/tag/v1.4.0

scripts.prepack: node scripts/inject-release-notes.js && npm run clean && npm run build
